*div1 type="summary"* *p*Introducing William Haydon.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-26-1826">26 January 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir Permit me to make you acquainted with my friend *person_mentioned*William Haydon*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Jessamine County Kentucky*/location_mentioned* You will find him an amiable Correct young gentleman he visits your *location_mentioned*Grant*/location_mentioned* With an intention of settling in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* If pleased with it please render him any services or attentions you may have in your power during his stay with you and they will be thankfully Recollected If those two *person_mentioned*gentlemen*/person_mentioned* should returned pleased with the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* many persons will move to it from a *location_mentioned*Rich part of this state*/location_mentioned* please speak of me to your *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Barron*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Don M Allouri*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mosquis*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L. Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
